text: 261px ' (September 28, 1721 – September 25, 1780) was a Japanese daimyō of the Edo period, who ruled the Tokushima Domain. His court title was Awa no kami. ==Family== * Father: Matsudaira Yorihiro (1700-1737) * Mother: Sano-dono * Wife: Motohime (d.1742), daughter of Hachisuka Yoshitake * Concubines: ** Kume-dono ** Kose-dono ** Unknown * Children: ** Daughter by Motohime ** Ishimatsu by Kume-dono ** Yoshiko married Sanjo Saneoki by Kose-dono ** Yonosuke by Kose-dono ** daughter by Kose-dono ** Hachisuka Yoshimitsu (1769-1812) ** Daughter by Unknown ** Daughter by Unknown ** Daughter by Unknown ** Kamechiyo by Unknown ==References== Category:1721 births Category:1780 deaths Category:Daimyo Category:Hachisuka clan
title: Hachisuka Muneshige
